revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=E2500 |revision=v2 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |fcc_date=11/16/2012 |fcc_id=Q87-E2500V2 |ic_id=3839A-E2500V2 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5358UB0 |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Samsung |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5358UB0 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43236 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=FreshTomato |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=CiscoXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Cisco[A-Z0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=48:F8:B3 |oui_eth=48:F8:B3 }} "3753-30000501R" and the ''Cisco'' logo is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This device seems to be another BCM5358UB0 (identifiable in FCC photos) + BCM43236x (not identifiable) device.
Flashed with third party firmware, dmesg reports: * 8MB ST compatible serial flash * CPU: BCM5357 rev 2 at 300 MHz * Determined physical RAM memory: 65536k * ethx: Broadcom BCM47XX 10/100/1000 Mbps Ethernet Controller 5.100.138.9 This data was used to determine Flash and RAM size
The default SSID pattern is '''CiscoXXXXX''', where '''XXXXX''' is the last 5 digits of the router's serial number.
